features: A hand care collection inspired by the great Scandinavian outdoors. Richly moisturising vegan formula with organic aloe vera & Swedish rapeseed oil. Nourishes, hydrates and softens dry or exposed skin.

SKOG - Swedish/Norwegian for ‘forest’. Boreal forests cover over half the Scandinavian lands. FJORD - Norwegian Spectacular rock faces, crashing waterfalls, cascading forests, and abundant orchards magnify the drama of the West Norwegian fjords. ØY - Norwegian for ‘island’. Hundreds of thousands of uninhabited islands glitter like stars upon the lakes of Scandinavia. HAV - Scandinavian for ‘sea’. The waters of the Arctic, North Atlantic and Baltic seas surround the Scandinavian region.

SKOG: Pine needles and fir cones, birch sap and woodland lily of the valley. FJORD: Apple and pear blossom, orchard fruits and redcurrants. ØY: Crabapple and dog rose, water mosses and green leaves. HAV: Salt spray and sea kelp, hawthorn and beach rose.
Formulated with 98% natural ingredients, and 60% certified organic ingredients (excluding water), and protected inside post-consumer recycled metal tubes.
How to use: Apply a small amount to the back of the hand and massage into the skin.
